reviewText: We take for granted our laws to protect society. This movie helped me to realise that other countries can and do made laws so they could legally exterminate unwanted people in their country. That's what Hitler did. All above board and legal. It was legal because they passed laws making it legal. Disturbed me to think this is where the United States is headed. Darwin's Evolution - survival of the fittest. Those with the most violent idealism believing they are supperior and justify themselves as they destroy their fellow man. Evolution- equals NO GOD AND NO CONSEQUENCES. We are equal in the sight of God, but not in the sight of man.
